item.title: ‘The 40-Year-Old Virgin’ Turns 20: Judd Apatow on Controversial Scenes and the Studio Shutting Down Production
item.description: The filmmaker talks to The Hollywood Reporter about Seth Rogen’s regrets over the “You know how I know you’re gay?” jokes: “It was all done with a very positive spirit.”
